column4: is it possible to connect to Ubuntu via Remote Desktop Connection on Windows?
i do not think so you can use VNC afaik
and is there a user spesific version of that file?
will I need to log out and back in?
GEdit has a Python Console plugin that lets you have an interactive python interpreter in the bottom panel. However, I can't import my own modules there.
so I need to set PYTHONPATH so Gedit will read it and give it to the python interpreter.
